name: Sepling
text1: Seplingyi Elda Yulengfa, that's a beautiful name btw :D
textInChatBox: Hello pling, I wanna to say something to you...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text31: I don't have the courage to say that.
text32: And I thought I should try to do it.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishText: I'm totally crushing on you!! Is there any chance we could be more than just a friends?
outroText: Okay, now tell me if you liked it and don't forget to give me the answer.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
